entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets ending late this evening then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with drizzle early in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
